event.title: FOSDEM '25 - Friendica - under the radar since 2010, in Brussels, Belgium

body.p: Tobias Diekershoff, a FSFE System Hacker and core developer of the Friendica project, along with Michael Vogel, also a core member of the Friendica development team, will provide a concise introduction to Friendica. They will highlight its unique features and explain how it stands apart from other systems.
FOSDEM 2025 is taking place on 1 and 2 February at the ULB Solbosch Campus, Brussels
